Golding, Lord of the Flies.

options.B: father to everyone in the community

text: The mood captured in the lines above is one of
explanation: The lines in the excerpt from Charity Angya'sThe Cycle of the Moonevoke a sense of unease and foreboding. The phrases "winds howl forth," "hold back hold back," and "make minced meat of your prey" suggest danger and violence, creating a tense and fearful atmosphere. The repetition of "howl forth" and the mention of "endless time" also contribute to a mood of uncertainty and fear.

text:
This question is based on General Literary Principles
The overall design of a drama to which all other components relate is its
explanation: In literature—especiallydrama—thestructureis to theoverall framework or designof the play. It is theorganised way the plot and elements like exposition, rising action, climax and resolution are arrangedto form a coherent and meaningful story.

This question is based on General Literary Principles
A system of plot development which creates the future through anticipation and the past through memory is
explanation: The termavant-garderefers to innovative and experimental approaches in art, literature, and other creative fields. In the context of plot development, it represents a system that challenges traditional narrative structures by creating the future through anticipation and the past through memory.
